dublin_core.dcvalue: The empirical study carried out within the OAUNET in Obafemi Awolowo University showed that the pattern of aggregate traffic levels fluctuates following the Extreme Value Type I distribution function. Peak periods are the time of maximum usage, mostly during the day, especially during working hours, while off-peak periods are in the early hours of the day and late hours in the evenings. These patterns characterise Internet usage and are also observed in research and academic networks of the HEI.
